title: MadamaButterfly_(DomingoyFreni)_[1974].avi
description:
Director: Jean-Pierre Ponnelle

Production: Fritz Buttenstedt

Conductor: Herbert Von Karajan with the Wiener Philarmoniker

Duration: 145 min

Plot: Madama Butterfly was written by Puccini at the turn of the 20th century and is considered a very dramatic opera with great solo arias (Un bel di vedremo, Amore o grillo). Ponnelle decided to present this opera as a flashback with Pinkerton bursting through the paper wall of a Japanese house after the tragic event that consumed Cio-Cio-san life. The film was make in Berlin in 1974 having Karajan&#039;s recording as a playback.
